body: This is my 500th post, yay!  It's come a long way since <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2002/04.aspx">April of 2002</a> when it started out as just a <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2002/04/28/157.aspx">dynamic AIM profile</a>.  Of course the actual first post that I made was the <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2002/04/28/155.aspx">obligatory clich√©d movie/music quote</a>. (what? you were expecting a <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/03/09/HelloWorld.aspx">hello world</a> post?)
